instruction: Develop a health app feature that analyzes sleep patterns using audio recordings of sleep sounds and provides personalized sleep improvement tips (text).
output-abstract: 1. Audio Analysis, 2. Sleep Pattern Identification, 3. Personalized Tips.
output-detail: 1. Audio Analysis: Record and analyze different sleep sounds to recognize patterns. 2. Sleep Pattern Identification: Categorize the audio into sleep stages and note disturbances. 3. Personalized Tips: Generate text-based advice based on the identified sleep patterns, focusing on improving sleep quality.

instruction: Create a digital cookbook that includes a collection of recipes (text), instructional videos (video), and high-quality images of the dishes (image). Provide a summary analysis of the cookbook's theme (text).
output-abstract: 1. Collection of Recipes, 2. Instructional Videos, 3. Dish Images, 4. Cookbook Summary.
output-detail: 1. Collection of Recipes: Curate a variety of meal recipes, focusing on a central theme. 2. Instructional Videos: Film step-by-step guides for preparing some of the key dishes. 3. Dish Images: Photograph each completed dish in high resolution. 4. Cookbook Summary: Analyze and summarize the theme, target audience, and unique selling points of the cookbook.

instruction: Generate a short documentary on urban wildlife, combining narrated audio (audio), text-based facts (text), video clips of animals (video), and a photographic slideshow (image). Conclude with an analysis of urban wildlife's impact on local ecosystems (text).
output-abstract: 1. Narrated Audio, 2. Text Facts, 3. Video Clips, 4. Photo Slideshow, 5. Ecosystem Impact Analysis.
output-detail: 1. Narrated Audio: Create engaging audio narration detailing the life of urban wildlife. 2. Text Facts: Compile interesting facts about each species featured. 3. Video Clips: Capture short clips of animals in urban settings. 4. Photo Slideshow: Assemble a series of high-quality images for a visual journey. 5. Ecosystem Impact Analysis: Discuss the symbiotic relationships and challenges between urban wildlife and city ecosystems.

instruction: Compose a piece of instrumental music inspired by rain (audio), create a digital painting of the mood the music evokes (image), and write a descriptive analysis (text) of how the elements interconnect.
output-abstract: 1. Instrumental Music, 2. Digital Painting, 3. Descriptive Analysis.
output-detail: 1. Instrumental Music: Develop a soothing, rain-inspired melody using various instruments. 2. Digital Painting: Create artwork that visualizes the feeling evoked by the music. 3. Descriptive Analysis: Analyze how the music's mood is effectively captured and reflected in the digital painting.

instruction: Design a virtual travel experience featuring historical landmarks around the world. Include interactive maps (image), narrated historical backgrounds (audio), panoramic videos of the landmarks (video), and engaging quizzes (text) about each site.
output-abstract: 1. Interactive Maps, 2. Narrated Histories, 3. Panoramic Videos, 4. Engaging Quizzes.
output-detail: 1. Interactive Maps: Create detailed maps that allow users to virtually travel between landmarks. 2. Narrated Histories: Provide audio narration that details the history and significance of each landmark. 3. Panoramic Videos: Film 360-degree videos at each landmark for immersive virtual tours. 4. Engaging Quizzes: Develop informative quizzes that test users' knowledge on the landmarks visited.

instruction: Produce an educational series on solar system exploration, including an introductory animation (video), infographic posters on each planet (image), narrations explaining their unique features (audio), and a concluding video summarizing key discoveries (video).
output-abstract: 1. Introductory Animation, 2. Infographic Posters, 3. Planet Narrations, 4. Summary Video.
output-detail: 1. Introductory Animation: Create an engaging video that introduces the solar system exploration theme. 2. Infographic Posters: Design posters for each planet, highlighting their characteristics visually. 3. Planet Narrations: Record audio descriptions for the unique features and facts of each planet. 4. Summary Video: Produce a concluding video that gathers all key facts and discoveries into a compelling narrative.

instruction: Curate a virtual art gallery exhibit featuring contemporary digital artists. Incorporate artist interviews (video and audio), artwork images (image), and critical reviews of the pieces (text). Offer a virtual tour of the gallery (video).
output-abstract: 1. Artist Interviews, 2. Artwork Images, 3. Critical Reviews, 4. Virtual Tour.
output-detail: 1. Artist Interviews: Conduct and record interviews with the artists on their inspirations and techniques, in both video and audio formats. 2. Artwork Images: Collect high-resolution images of the featured artworks. 3. Critical Reviews: Write insightful critiques on the artworks showcased. 4. Virtual Tour: Develop a video tour that guides viewers through the exhibit, including commentary on selected pieces.

instruction: Create a promotional campaign for a new e-bike model, including a catchy slogan (text), a demonstration video highlighting its features (video), lifestyle photos with the e-bike (image), and ambient background music for the video (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Catchy Slogan, 2. Demonstration Video, 3. Lifestyle Photos, 4. Background Music.
output-detail: 1. Catchy Slogan: Craft a memorable phrase that encapsulates the e-bike's appeal. 2. Demonstration Video: Produce a video showing the e-bike in action, emphasizing its unique features. 3. Lifestyle Photos: Photograph the e-bike in various urban settings, showcasing its versatility. 4. Background Music: Compose or select a suitable ambient track to enhance the video's mood.

instruction: Develop a multilingual language learning platform featuring basics of languages. Include interactive audio lessons (audio), written exercises (text), video pronunciation guides (video), and flashcards for vocabulary (image).
output-abstract: 1. Audio Lessons, 2. Written Exercises, 3. Pronunciation Guides, 4. Vocabulary Flashcards.
output-detail: 1. Audio Lessons: Create engaging lessons focusing on pronunciation and listening skills. 2. Written Exercises: Provide text-based grammatical exercises and quizzes. 3. Pronunciation Guides: Film native speakers demonstrating the correct pronunciation of words and sentences. 4. Vocabulary Flashcards: Design flashcards with the word, its meaning, and a picture to aid memorization.

instruction: Organize a virtual music festival featuring various artists. Plan for live performances (video), artist interviews (audio), interactive fan Q&A sessions (text), and a festival highlights reel (video).
output-abstract: 1. Live Performances, 2. Artist Interviews, 3. Fan Q&A, 4. Highlights Reel.
output-detail: 1. Live Performances: Schedule and stream live performances from multiple artists in a cohesive sequence. 2. Artist Interviews: Record pre- or post-performance interviews with artists discussing their music and experiences. 3. Fan Q&A: Host text-based interactive Q&A sessions allowing fans to ask artists questions. 4. Highlights Reel: Compile the best moments from performances, interviews, and Q&As into a memorable video montage.

instruction: Design an interactive online journey through the history of cinema, including text-based timelines (text), iconic movie clips (video), poster collections (image), and soundtrack medleys (audio). End with an analytical essay on cinema's evolution (text).
output-abstract: 1. Timelines, 2. Movie Clips, 3. Poster Collections, 4. Soundtrack Medleys, 5. Analytical Essay.
output-detail: 1. Timelines: Develop comprehensive timelines highlighting key milestones in cinema history. 2. Movie Clips: Curate clips from iconic films representing different eras. 3. Poster Collections: Assemble digital galleries of movie posters over the decades. 4. Soundtrack Medleys: Collect and merge pieces of significant film scores. 5. Analytical Essay: Write a detailed exploration of how cinema has evolved and its impact on culture and society.

instruction: Produce a multi-episode podcast series on innovative technologies, featuring expert interviews (audio), show notes with key points and resources (text), and interactive listener polls on each episode's topic (text).
output-abstract: 1. Expert Interviews, 2. Show Notes, 3. Listener Polls.
output-detail: 1. Expert Interviews: Record discussions with technology experts covering various innovative topics. 2. Show Notes: Compile detailed notes including summary, key points, and additional resources for each episode. 3. Listener Polls: Create and share interactive polls related to the episode's content, encouraging audience engagement.

instruction: Launch an online travel guide to European cities, showcasing street-level photography (image), narrated cultural histories (audio), city-specific travel tips (text), and virtual reality tours of landmarks (video).
output-abstract: 1. Street-Level Photography, 2. Cultural Histories, 3. Travel Tips, 4. Virtual Tours.
output-detail: 1. Street-Level Photography: Capture the essence of each city from a pedestrian's perspective through high-quality images. 2. Cultural Histories: Present audio narrations exploring the rich histories and cultural backgrounds of the featured cities. 3. Travel Tips: Write practical, city-specific advice for travelers. 4. Virtual Tours: Develop VR-compatible videos for an immersive experience of the cities' major landmarks.

instruction: Create a series of educational children’s books that include simple narratives (text), accompanying illustrations (image), audio story versions (audio), and animated storybook videos (video).
output-abstract: 1. Narratives, 2. Illustrations, 3. Audio Stories, 4. Animated Videos.
output-detail: 1. Narratives: Write engaging stories with educational themes tailored for children. 2. Illustrations: Produce colorful and expressive illustrations that complement each story. 3. Audio Stories: Record narrations of the stories, adding sound effects and music to enhance engagement. 4. Animated Videos: Create animated adaptations of the stories, bringing them to life for young viewers.

instruction: Develop a marketing strategy for an eco-friendly product, involving an educational infographic (image) about environmental impacts, a promotional video (video) demonstrating the product in use, customer testimonials (video), and a FAQ section (text).
output-abstract: 1. Educational Infographic, 2. Promotional Video, 3. Customer Testimonials, 4. FAQ Section.
output-detail: 1. Educational Infographic: Design an infographic that illustrates the environmental benefits of the eco-friendly product. 2. Promotional Video: Produce a video that showcases how the product works and its advantages. 3. Customer Testimonials: Compile video interviews with users sharing their positive experiences. 4. FAQ Section: Create a detailed FAQ to address potential questions and concerns, providing informative answers.

instruction: Compose a meditation guide combining soothing background tracks (audio), calming imagery (image), guided meditation scripts (text), and instructional meditation videos (video).
output-abstract: 1. Background Tracks, 2. Calming Imagery, 3. Meditation Scripts, 4. Instructional Videos.
output-detail: 1. Background Tracks: Select or compose peaceful music pieces that enhance relaxation. 2. Calming Imagery: Curate or create images with tranquil scenes or abstract patterns that promote calmness. 3. Meditation Scripts: Write scripts for guided meditations, focusing on various techniques and themes. 4. Instructional Videos: Produce videos that visually guide viewers through meditation exercises and practices.

instruction: Organize a coding bootcamp program with tutorial videos (video), coding exercises (text), interactive coding challenges (text), and a gallery of project showcases (image). Include participant feedback as a reflection (text).
output-abstract: 1. Tutorial Videos, 2. Coding Exercises, 3. Interactive Challenges, 4. Project Showcases, 5. Participant Feedback.
output-detail: 1. Tutorial Videos: Create concise, informative videos covering essential programming concepts and languages. 2. Coding Exercises: Design a series of text-based exercises that reinforce the video lessons. 3. Interactive Challenges: Develop challenges that encourage learners to apply their skills in real-world scenarios. 4. Project Showcases: Compile a digital gallery of standout projects completed by participants. 5. Participant Feedback: Collect and summarize feedback from participants to highlight the program's impact and areas for improvement.

instruction: Create a social media campaign for a charity event, including an event announcement video (video), visually engaging posters (image), descriptive posts outlining the event's purpose (text), and a catchy theme song (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Announcement Video, 2. Posters, 3. Descriptive Posts, 4. Theme Song.
output-detail: 1. Announcement Video: Produce a compelling video that teases the event and calls to action. 2. Posters: Design eye-catching posters that highlight key information and the event date. 3. Descriptive Posts: Develop descriptive social media posts that detail the event's goals, significance, and why people should participate. 4. Theme Song: Compose an original, catchy song that encapsulates the spirit of the charity event.

instruction: Develop a study platform for historical battles, including detailed articles on each battle (text), maps showing troop movements (image), documentary-style explanation videos (video), and a podcast series featuring expert analysis (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Detailed Articles, 2. Maps, 3. Explanation Videos, 4. Podcast Series.
output-detail: 1. Detailed Articles: Write comprehensive articles that cover the background, key figures, and outcomes of significant battles. 2. Maps: Create or curate maps that visually illustrate troop movements and strategies. 3. Explanation Videos: Film documentary-style videos that provide visual and narrative insights into each battle. 4. Podcast Series: Produce a podcast series with historians and military experts discussing lesser-known details and analysis of the battles.

instruction: Launch an online platform for film enthusiasts, incorporating a blog for film reviews (text), a user-contributed photo gallery of movie-themed cosplay (image), podcasts discussing film theories and history (audio), and trailers of upcoming films (video).
output-abstract: 1. Film Reviews, 2. Cosplay Gallery, 3. Podcasts, 4. Upcoming Trailers.
output-detail: 1. Film Reviews: Create a blog where contributors can post detailed analyses of films, both classic and new. 2. Cosplay Gallery: Enable users to upload images of their movie-themed cosplay, creating a vibrant community gallery. 3. Podcasts: Develop a series of podcasts where hosts engage in discussions about film theories, history, and industry insights. 4. Upcoming Trailers: Provide a section for the latest trailers, allowing fans to watch and discuss upcoming films.

instruction: Design a tutorial for beginner photographers, including text-based photography principles (text), example photos showing different techniques (image), video tutorials for using camera settings (video), and a podcast discussing common challenges and solutions (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Photography Principles, 2. Technique Examples, 3. Camera Setting Tutorials, 4. Challenge Podcast.
output-detail: 1. Photography Principles: Write concise guides covering basic photography rules and composition tips. 2. Technique Examples: Showcase photographs that illustrate various shooting techniques and the effects achieved. 3. Camera Setting Tutorials: Produce videos that explain how to adjust camera settings for different scenarios. 4. Challenge Podcast: Create a podcast series addressing common beginner photographer challenges with expert advice and solution discussions.
